definitions.definition: A grove of small growth; a thicket of brushwood; a wood cut at certain times for fuel or other purposes, typically managed to promote growth and ensure a reliable supply of timber. See copse.
To manage (a wooded area) sustainably, as a coppice, by periodically cutting back woody plants to promote new growth.
definitions.example: Her plan to coppice the woods should keep her self-sufficient in fuel indefinitely.
